name: Bubble Shooter - Frozen Pop
description:
Looking for a relaxing game for Christmas Holiday? Just download this classic bubble shooter game. Then you can enjoy tons of fun every day, any time, any where!

- 1000+ challenging levels.
- Free bonus every day.
- Free boosters in every level.
- Unlimited play times.
- Cute pets and bubbles in frozen word.
